senses.sense: a camera that records moving pictures and sounds and allows these to be shown on the Internet as they happen

senses.sense: as a type of something

senses.sense: to get what you want, although it might upset other people

senses.sense: to be successful and make progress in your work

senses.sense: to try very hard to do something pleasant for someone

senses.sense: to finish a task or to get rid of something unpleasant

senses.sense: used to say that someone or something does something to a large degree

senses.sense: the  connected pages on the Internet, which you can search to find particular information

senses.sense: having a lot of money

senses.sense: to have a heaviness of a stated amount, or to measure the heaviness of an object

senses.sense: wearing attractive, good-quality clothes

senses.sense: famous
senses.dict_examp: a well-known actor/artist/film star/singer

senses.sense: having had a good education

senses.sense: working in an effective and successful way because of good organization

senses.sense: said as a greeting to someone arriving at a place

senses.sense: to greet someone who has arrived in a  place

senses.sense: to be pleased about something and encourage or support it

senses.sense: said as a polite answer when someone thanks you for doing something

senses.sense: used to tell someone that they can certainly do something, if they want to

senses.sense: when someone is met and spoken to in a friendly way when they arrive in a place

senses.sense: to stay somewhere too long so that people want you to leave

senses.sense: in a successful or satisfactory way

senses.lear_examp: I play guitar very well and I love rock!

senses.sense: in addition (to)

senses.sense: in a complete way or as much as possible

senses.sense: used to say that something is likely to be true

senses.sense: used to emphasize some adjectives

senses.sense: healthy; not sick

senses.sense: everything is in a good or acceptable state

senses.lear_examp: You have also wrongly accused the organizers of spending too much money on organizing the event.

senses.sense: not correct
senses.dict_examp: Three of your answers were wrong.
senses.lear_examp: We listen to a tape sometimes, and mark wrong letters.

senses.sense: to think or say something that is not correct
senses.dict_examp: I was wrong about the time - the store closed at 7, not 8.
senses.lear_examp: If I'm not wrong, it is in the living room.

senses.sense: to produce an answer or result that is not correct, or to say or write something that is not correct
senses.dict_examp: I got most of the answers wrong.

senses.sense: If something is wrong, there is a problem.
senses.dict_examp: You've been quiet all evening. Is there anything wrong?
senses.lear_examp: I didn't know him, so I thought that there was something wrong.

senses.sense: not considered morally acceptable by most people
senses.dict_examp: Children should be taught that violence is wrong.
senses.lear_examp: To sum up, I think it is wrong to keep animals in zoos.

senses.sense: not suitable or correct, or not as it should be
senses.dict_examp: She's the wrong person for the job.
senses.lear_examp: Personally I prefer to think that you gave the job to the wrong person.

senses.sense: to start a relationship or activity badly
senses.dict_examp: He got off on the wrong foot with my parents by arriving late.
senses.lear_examp: One of the greatest pleasures of reading "The Remains of the Day" would be to see the gradual development of the relationship between Stevens and Miss Kenton. From the beginning, they get off on the wrong foot.

senses.sense: in a way that is not correct
senses.dict_examp: You spelled my name wrong.

senses.sense: to develop problems
senses.dict_examp: Something's gone wrong with my computer.
senses.lear_examp: Despite all that went wrong, there was something I really enjoyed. It was visiting the Diamond Cave.

senses.sense: used when you do not want someone to think that you do not like someone or something
senses.dict_examp: Don't get me wrong, I like her, but she can be very annoying.
senses.lear_examp: Don't get me wrong, I love my aunts, I really do, but not as houseguests.
